    Laboratory Data

    Function reference

    All functions

    aebar()
    Bar chart for number of events reported per participant
    aedot()
    Dot plot to visualise AE and harm profiles in two-arm randomised controlled trials
    aeseverity()
    Table of frequencies and proportions of events by severity categories
    aestacked()
    Stacked bar chart of proportions for each body system class by arm and maximum severity
    aetable()
    Table of AE summary by body system class
    df2
    Sample adverse event dataset with 2 treatment arms
    df3
    Sample adverse event dataset with 3 treatment arms
    df4
    Sample adverse event dataset with 4 treatment arms
    lab2
    Sample laboratory values with continuous outcomes dataset with 2 treatment arms
    lab3
    Sample laboratory values with continuous outcomes dataset with 3 treatment arms
    lab4
    Sample laboratory values with continuous outcomes dataset with 3 treatment arms
    labtable()
    Table of summary statistics and model estimates for laboratory values with continuous outcomes

    Developed by Xiao Xuan Tan.
